column1: What is advertising? Is it …1… the truth or is it making things look better than they really are? Or is it lying? Companies pay a lot of money for adverts. Some of the ads you see in glossy magazines look like art. The commercials on TV  ….2… like mini movies. Do they really change our   …3… ? Do adverts make you buy things? I think some advertising is a  …4…. of lying. Is BMW really “The ultimate driving machine” like they say in their ads? British Airways used to say they  …5…“The world’s favourite airline,” but had to stop saying it because it wasn’t true. Personally, I get tired of watching ads on television. They always interrupt a good programme. I like ads in magazines. They’re usually quite  interesting.
